New Records: Parker Meadows' grand slam was the 2nd-fastest pitch a Tigers player has homered off of in the pitch-tracking era (2008)
Key Match Events: The Tigers scored four runs in the bottom of the ninth inning to stun the Padres and win the game 4-3
Others: Parker Meadows is hitting.225 this season with six homers and 17 RBI. He has nine stolen bases, runs well and also plays solid defense.
